comments.body: I would put this part first since it's the most important part of this comment. Also consider doing something to draw the readers eye to it.
Moving the `When depending on this package...`-part first makes sense.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +28,32 @@{{#withPluginHook}}
  {{pluginProjectName}}:
    # When depending on this package from a real application you should use:
    #   {{pluginProjectName}}: ^x.y.z
    # See https://dart.dev/tools/pub/dependencies#version-constraints

comments.body: This line should be removed as well.
And we may want to add a comment in here about why this line is here and when it should be removed, if ever.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +5,9 @@# pub.dev using `pub publish`. This is preferred for private packages.
publish_to: 'none' # Remove this line if you wish to publish to pub.dev
{{^withPluginHook}}

# The following defines the version and build number for your application.

comments.body: nit - maybe just move the comment to the line above
nit: "private packages and applications" might be better, since many of our developers wouldn't understand that their app is also a package.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +4,8 @@# The following line prevents the package from being accidentally published to
# pub.dev using `pub publish`. This is preferred for private packages.
publish_to: 'none' # Remove this line if you wish to publish to pub.dev
{{^withPluginHook}}
